summary: A module for JAGS containing several covariance functions for point-referenced data analysis and a function that creates the precision matrix for the proper CAR model for areal data analysis.
title: Geojags

summary: Veraz is a project of the Stats4good group, which is as team of graduate students that analyze data from the Brazilian federal government expenses. This is challenging since we deal with a great amout of data. We maintain a blog with our analyses.
title: Veraz
